summary: Altered Fist adds a set of Alteration spells geared towards Unarmed combat.
descriptionHtml:
Altered Fist
============

Altered Fist adds a set of Alteration spells geared towards Unarmed combat. Scrolls and tomes for these spells can be purchased from Tolfdir at the College of Winterhold as your Alteration skill increases.

Here is what you can expect:

Oak Hands: Unarmed +8 for 60 seconds
Stone Palms: Unarmed +12 for 60 seconds
Iron Knuckles: Unarmed +16 for 60 seconds
Ebony Fists: Unarmed +20 for 60 seconds
Dragon Claws: Unarmed +24 for 60 seconds

Also, scrolls provide the same buff as tomes but with half the duration.

Installation
===========

Please extract AlteredFist.bsa and AlteredFist.esp to Skyrim\'s Data folder and ensure the mod is set to load before playing.

Compatibility
=============

This mod was tested on Skyrim v1.9.32.0.8 and cleaned with TES5Edit v3.0.30.

It does not make any changes to the base game and is entirely script-driven.  In other words, it should be compatible with pretty much everything! :)

Known Issues
=============

-Players are unable to purchase scrolls for Ebony Fists or Dragon Claws.
--This issue appears to be a Skyrim bug with Expert and Master-level spell scrolls.

Disclaimer
==========

-Support for this modification will be provided at my discretion.

-Please feel free to distribute this modification provided it remains unaltered.

-Please contact me if you wish to alter or localize this modification.
--I go by \"KainXavier\" on the Nexus network and \"Kain-Xavier\" on Steam.

v1.3 Change List
================

-Tolfdir\'s inventory will also be restocked after every saved game load.

v1.2 Change List
================

-Tolfdir\'s inventory will be restocked with AF items every time you visit him.

v1.1 Change List
================

-Dragon Claws spell functions like other Master-level spells now.
author: Kain-Xavier
